name: Ext_R5_MessageHeader_de_endpoint
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MessageHeader.destination.endpoint[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MessageHeader.destination.endpoint[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MessageHeader|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Actual destination address or Endpoint resource
element.definition: Indicates where the message should be routed.
element.comment: `MessageHeader.destination.endpoint[x]` maps to R4B `MessageHeader.destination.endpoint`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
